translations: n．传教士：宗教组织派遣的宣扬宗教信仰、进行教育和医疗等工作的人。
· The missioners went to Africa to spread their faith.
传教士们去非洲传播他们的信仰。

sentences.sentence: All the missioners staying in Canton were expelled. Again, under the plea of missioners serving in the imperial court, three missioners were allowed to return to Canton.
sentences.translation: 经过宫廷里的传教士再次请求，最终有三名被逐传教士得以返回广州。
